Text: LOL most Snow Leopard I've seen on here does not come with Windows bootcamp. All DMG are created by Disk Utility and it has major issues writing iso joilet. Anyways I forgot to mention in description this is a retail disk, not one that came with my MacPro 5.1... People need to learn how to copy applications bit for bit by using toast instead of DU.
